name: Kitchen Knife
description: A sharp chef's knife. Alain Ducasse would not approve.
useMessage: You slash with the kitchen knife.
breakMessage: The blade snaps off at the handle.

name: Steak Knife
description: A serrated steak knife from Restaurant Le Dali.
useMessage: You jab with the serrated blade.
breakMessage: The steak knife's blade bends uselessly.

name: Glass Shard
description: A jagged piece of glass. Cuts both ways.
useMessage: You slash with the glass shard. It bites into your palm too.
breakMessage: The glass shard shatters into useless fragments.

name: Frying Pan
description: Cast iron. Heavy but satisfying.
useMessage: You swing the frying pan with a resounding clang.
breakMessage: The pan's handle finally breaks off.

name: Crowbar
description: Solid steel. Opens doors and skulls equally well.
useMessage: You bring the crowbar down hard.

name: Police Baton
description: Standard issue. Previous owner didn't need it anymore.
useMessage: You crack the baton against rotting flesh.

name: Emergency Axe
description: Fire emergency axe. Red paint flaking.
useMessage: You bury the axe deep. Pulling it out takes effort.
breakMessage: The axe head flies off the splintered handle.

name: Wooden Plank
description: A sturdy wooden plank. Weapon or building material -- your call.
useMessage: You swing the plank like a cricket bat.
breakMessage: The plank cracks in two with a sad splintering sound.

name: Revolver
description: A snub-nosed revolver. Six shots. Make them count.
useMessage: The revolver barks. The sound echoes through the dead city.

name: Pistol Ammo
description: 9mm rounds. Each one is worth more than gold now.
useMessage: You reload with a satisfying click.

name: Flare Gun
description: Fires a bright signal flare. One shot to call for rescue -- or attract every corpse in the arrondissement.
useMessage: The flare screams skyward, painting the clouds red.
breakMessage: The flare gun is spent. It's just a plastic shell now.

name: Shinai
description: A bamboo kendo sword. Light and fast.
useMessage: You strike with practiced precision. Men!

name: Boat Oar
description: A wooden oar. Long reach keeps the dead at arm's length -- and then some.
useMessage: You swing the oar in a wide arc.
breakMessage: The oar snaps in half. Time to find a new paddle.

name: Canned Food
description: Unlabeled tin can. Could be anything from cassoulet to cat food.
useMessage: You pry open the can and eat. Best not to think about what it was.

name: Energy Bar
description: Protein bar. Expired but edible.
useMessage: You chew through the chalky bar. Tastes like cardboard and survival.

name: Minibar Snacks
description: Tiny bags of nuts, chocolate, and stale crisps from the minibar.
useMessage: You tear open the tiny bags. Somehow they still cost 12 euros in your mind.

name: Rat Meat
description: Raw rat. Desperate times call for desperate cuisine.
useMessage: You force down the rat meat. Your stomach protests violently.

name: Bottled Water
description: Evian. At least some things in Paris haven't changed.
useMessage: You drink deeply. Clean water never tasted so good.

name: Soda Can
description: Flat and warm, but wet.
useMessage: You crack open the can. The faint fizz is almost nostalgic.

name: Wine Bottle
description: Chateau something. Pairs well with existential dread.
useMessage: You take a long pull from the bottle. The vintage is... apocalyptic.

name: Whiskey Bottle
description: Single malt. Burns going down but warms you from the inside.
useMessage: You take a swig. The whiskey scorches your throat. You feel braver, if not smarter.

name: First Aid Kit
description: Standard first aid kit. Bandages, antiseptic, hope.
useMessage: You patch yourself up with practiced hands. It stings, but you'll live.

name: Painkillers
description: Paracetamol. Takes the edge off.
useMessage: You swallow two pills dry. The pain recedes to a dull throb.

name: Antibiotics
description: Amoxicillin. Worth its weight in gold when infection sets in.
useMessage: You take the antibiotics. The infection should clear up soon.

name: Bandages
description: Gauze bandages. Better than nothing.
useMessage: You wrap the wound tightly. The bleeding slows.

name: Improved Medkit
description: A well-stocked medical kit with surgical supplies. Someone knew what they were doing.
useMessage: You carefully suture and dress the wound. Almost professional.

name: Matches
description: A box of matches. About half left.
useMessage: You strike a match. The small flame dances in the darkness.
breakMessage: You strike the last match. The box is empty.

name: Lighter
description: A Zippo lighter. Still has fluid.
useMessage: You flick the lighter open. The flame holds steady.
breakMessage: The lighter sputters and dies. Out of fluid.

name: Rope
description: Ten metres of nylon rope. A survivor's best friend.
useMessage: You secure the rope tightly.

name: Silk Rope
description: Silk rope from the hotel curtains. Surprisingly strong.
useMessage: You fasten the silk rope. It holds -- for now.
breakMessage: The silk rope frays and snaps apart.

name: Cloth Bandage
description: Torn cloth strips. Useful for crafting or makeshift bandages.
useMessage: You wrap the cloth strips around the wound.

name: Duct Tape
description: The universal fix. If you can't duct it, you're not using enough.
useMessage: You tear off a strip of duct tape. That should hold.
breakMessage: You pull the last strip of tape from the empty roll.

name: Rubber Hose
description: Rubber tubing. Good for siphoning fuel from abandoned vehicles.
useMessage: You insert the hose and begin siphoning.

name: Candles
description: Church candles. Provide dim light and a faint scent of incense.
useMessage: You light a candle. Shadows retreat to the edges of the room.
breakMessage: The last candle gutters and dies.

name: Padlock
description: A sturdy padlock with key. Secure a room behind you.
useMessage: You snap the padlock shut. Nothing is getting through that.

name: Flashlight
description: LED flashlight. Essential underground where the darkness is absolute.
useMessage: You click the flashlight on. The beam cuts through the blackness.
breakMessage: The flashlight flickers and dies. The batteries are dead.

name: Flashlight Batteries
description: AA batteries. Recharge the flashlight and keep the dark at bay.
useMessage: You swap in fresh batteries. The flashlight beam strengthens.

name: Lockpick Set
description: A professional lockpick set. Someone's misspent youth is your gain.
useMessage: You work the picks carefully. Click. The lock gives way.
breakMessage: The last pick snaps in the lock. The set is useless now.

name: Toolbox
description: Mechanic's toolbox. Wrenches, screwdrivers, pliers -- everything for repairs.
useMessage: You rummage through the toolbox and find what you need.

name: Wrench
description: Adjustable wrench. Tightens bolts and loosens teeth.
useMessage: You swing the heavy wrench. It connects with a dull thud.

name: Binoculars
description: Military-grade binoculars. See things you wish you hadn't.
useMessage: You raise the binoculars and scan the distance.

name: Signal Mirror
description: A signal mirror. Catches the sun and sends it where you need it.
useMessage: You angle the mirror, catching a flash of sunlight.

name: Kevlar Vest
description: Police-issue ballistic vest. Heavy, hot, and the reason you're still breathing.
useMessage: You strap on the kevlar vest. It's uncomfortable but reassuring.

name: Hard Hat
description: Construction hard hat. Minor protection, major fashion statement.
useMessage: You put on the hard hat. Safety first, even in the apocalypse.

name: Warm Jacket
description: A warm winter jacket. Protection from cold Parisian nights and wandering teeth.
useMessage: You pull on the jacket. The chill fades a little.

name: Backpack
description: A sturdy hiking backpack. Carry more, survive longer.
useMessage: You sling the backpack over your shoulders. Room for more supplies.

name: Designer Bag
description: A Louis Vuitton bag. Surprisingly practical for the apocalypse.
useMessage: You sling the designer bag over your shoulder. At least you'll die fashionable.

name: Hotel Map
description: A floor plan of Le Meurice hotel. Someone has marked safe rooms in red ink.
useMessage: You study the hotel map. Several rooms are circled with notes scrawled beside them.

name: Radio Parts
description: Electronic components. Part of a military radio. Useless alone, vital together.
useMessage: You examine the radio parts. Circuit boards, capacitors, a frequency crystal.

name: Military Radio Parts
description: More radio components. Found at Place Vendome. The transmitter assembly.
useMessage: You turn the components over in your hands. This is the transmitter core.

name: Heavy-Duty Batteries
description: Heavy-duty batteries for the radio. Still sealed in plastic.
useMessage: You check the battery charge. Still good.

name: Boat Engine Part
description: A replacement starter motor for a marine engine. Heavy but essential for escape.
useMessage: You inspect the starter motor. It looks intact. This could get a boat running.

name: Fuel Can
description: A jerry can of diesel fuel. Sloshes when you walk.
useMessage: You shake the can. About three-quarters full.

name: Gasoline Can
description: A jerry can of gasoline. The fumes alone could wake the dead -- if they weren't already.
useMessage: You unscrew the cap carefully. The sharp smell of petrol fills the air.

name: Car Keys
description: Keys to a police car. Peugeot logo on the fob.
useMessage: You press the unlock button. Somewhere nearby, a car chirps in response.

name: Sewer Map
description: Hand-drawn map of the sewer system. Annotations in shaky handwriting.
useMessage: You unfold the damp map. Red X marks and 'DO NOT ENTER' warnings litter the margins.

name: Metro Map
description: Paris Metro map. Lines 1 and 7 highlighted in what you hope is red ink.
useMessage: You trace the metro lines with your finger. Several stations are circled.

name: Maintenance Key
description: A brass key labeled 'RATP Maintenance'. Opens service doors in the Metro.
useMessage: You insert the maintenance key. The lock turns with a heavy clunk.

name: Rooftop Key
description: Heavy steel key for the rooftop access door. The view up there might be worth the climb.
useMessage: You turn the key in the rooftop door. Wind rushes in from above.

name: Room Key 302
description: Hotel room key card. Room 302. The LED blinks green when you wave it.
useMessage: You swipe the key card. The lock clicks open.

name: Room Key 605
description: Hotel room key card. Room 605 - The Dali Suite. The most luxurious room in a dead hotel.
useMessage: You swipe the key card. The suite door opens to faded grandeur.

name: Flare
description: A road flare. Burns bright red for about fifteen minutes.
useMessage: You strike the flare. Angry red light floods the area.
breakMessage: The flare sputters and dies, leaving the smell of phosphorus.

name: Chalk
description: White chalk. For marking passages underground so you don't walk in circles.
useMessage: You mark an arrow on the wall. Breadcrumbs for the underworld.
breakMessage: The chalk crumbles to a nub too small to hold.

name: Waders
description: Waterproof wading boots. Essential for sewer travel unless you enjoy trench foot.
useMessage: You pull on the waders. Your feet stay dry. Small victories.

name: Rope Ladder
description: A rolled-up rope ladder. Opens up vertical escape routes.
useMessage: You unfurl the rope ladder and secure it. It sways gently in the darkness.

name: Old Key
description: An ancient iron key found in the wine cellar. What door has waited centuries for this?
useMessage: You try the old key. The lock resists, then yields with a groan of old iron.

name: Radio Manual
description: Military radio operations manual. Frequency tables inside. Knowledge is power.
useMessage: You flip through the manual. Emergency frequencies are highlighted on page 47.
